block.p: LEAD: Revlon has named Young & Rubicam as agency of record for all network television buying, and assigned it the Flex line of hair care products. The TV assignment had been at Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt, and Flex had been in house. This is Y.&R.'s first Revlon assignment and the first beauty product since it lost Oil of Olay earlier this decade.
